name: Airplane Truck Driving
description:
Airplane Truck Driving!!!
Sit behind the steering wheel of cargo transporter truck and enjoy transporting luggage in cargo plane. Be pro truck driver in this transport crane simulator with real trucker controls and tricky forklift parking in plane deck.

Features:

10 Unique Cargo transport Mission
Real Truck Driving physics
Multiple Vehicles selection
Smooth Handling, Lifting and Driving Controls
Amazing HD Graphics & sound effects
